result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul J Kohler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash bail applied.  Balance to be paid along with costs at $50.00 per month commencing 1/1/17 and each month thereafter or penalty of 12 days jail, consecutive, for non-payment.

Costs to be paid along with fine. 
*Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Sentence credit of 3 days was granted.  TIME SERVED.

records.addlTxt: Reminder notice mailed to the Defendant returned as undeliverable.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Paul J Kohler in court with attorney Jean Marie La Tour.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.
  The Defendant was sentenced as follows:

Count #1:

FINE: $379.00 (apply cash bail and balance to be paid at $50.00 per month commencing 1/1/17 or serve 12 days jail, consecutive, as penalty for non payment of fine);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00, to be paid at $50.00 per month consecutive to payment of fine.  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

JAIL: 3 days (apply 3 days credit) TIME SERVED.
Hearing on November 14, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Paul J Kohler in court with attorney Jean Marie La Tour.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney LaTour requests a further proceedings.  Court sets.  Hearing scheduled for November 14, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Hearing on November 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant to have no contact with Leonard L. listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  The Defendant is allowed 2 free phone calls.

Defendant Paul J Kohler in court, in custody.  Attorney Tony Rosario appears as a friend of the Court.  Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Attorney Rosario requests the Court set a small cash bail.  The State requests the Court set cash bail.  The Court sets bail as follows: Cash bail in the amount of $50.00 with the conditions previously ordered by the Court.   Defendant is allowed two free phone calls.   Hearing scheduled for November 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Bail/bond hearing on October 5, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
Motion to forfeit bail granted.
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 6/29/16 at 9:30 a.m.
Branch 9 Only
